alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 11:21AM PST until February 25 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...1-4 inches of wet snow. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult in some areas due to slippery roads and low visibility in falling snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some plant and tree damage is possible due to the weight of snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
